description: The user asks the assistant to send personalized thank‑you notes with slide links to each speaker. The assistant collects event and speaker information, uploads each speaker's slide PDF to obtain public URLs, and then sends individualized thank‑you emails that include the speaker's name and a link to their slides.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can synchronize venue calendars, manage vendor contracts, track RSVPs, generate event timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send emails on behalf of the user.
I want to send a personalized thank‑you note to each speaker with a link to their presentation slides.
Absolutely! Please provide the event ID and, for each speaker, their full name, email address, and the presentation file (PDF) encoded in base64.

Event ID: event_12345

Speakers:
1. Dr. Alice Smith
   Email: alice@example.com
   Slides file name: alice_smith_slides.pdf
   Slides (base64): UEsDBBQACAAI... (truncated base64 content for Alice)
2. Prof. Bob Jones
   Email: bob@example.com
   Slides file name: bob_jones_slides.pdf
   Slides (base64): UEsDBBQACAAI... (truncated base64 content for Bob)
Uploading the slide files to the event document store...
Slides have been uploaded. Now sending personalized thank‑you emails to each speaker...
